Drinks.Name: Trinidad Sour
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Alexander
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Americano
Drinks.Method: Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Soda Water. Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: Angel Face
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Aviation
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Barracuda
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Prosecco, shake well with ice, strain into chilled highball glass filled with ice and top up with Prosecco.

Drinks.Name: Bee’s Knees
Drinks.Method: Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Bellini
Drinks.Method: Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine. Stir gently and pour in a chilled flute glass.Note:PUCCINI – Fresh Mandarin Orange Juice;ROSSINI – Fresh Strawberry Puree;TINTORETTO – Fresh Pomegranate Juice.

Drinks.Name: Between the Sheets
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Black Russian
Drinks.Method: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.Note:WHITE RUSSIAN – Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

Drinks.Name: Bloody Mary
Drinks.Method: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass.Note:If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

Drinks.Name: Boulevardier
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Bramble
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.

Drinks.Name: Brandy Crusta
Drinks.Method: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Canchanchara
Drinks.Method: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

Drinks.Name: Caipirinha
Drinks.Method: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.Note:CAIPIROSKA – Instead of Cachaça use Vodka;

Drinks.Name: Casino
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.

Drinks.Name: Champagne Cocktail
Drinks.Method: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Pour gently chilled Champagne.

Drinks.Name: Clover Club
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Corpse Reviver #2
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Cosmopolitan
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Cuba Libre
Drinks.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

Drinks.Name: Daiquiri
Drinks.Method: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Dark ‘n’ stormy
Drinks.Method: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.

Drinks.Name: Dry Martini
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Espresso Martini
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Fernandito
Drinks.Method: Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola. Gently stir.

Drinks.Name: French 75
Drinks.Method: Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: French Connection
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: French Martini
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Gin Fizz
Drinks.Method: Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass , top with a splash soda water.NOTE:Serve without ice.

Drinks.Name: Golden Dream
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Grasshopper
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Hanky Panky
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Hemingway Special
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Horse’s Neck
Drinks.Method: Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently.If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

Drinks.Name: Illegal
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or “on the rocks” in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

Drinks.Name: Irish Coffee
Drinks.Method: Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing.Plain sugar can be replaced with simple syrup

Drinks.Name: John Collins
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice. Stir gently.NOTE:Use ‘Old Tom’ Gin for Tom Collins.

Drinks.Name: KIR
Drinks.Method: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.Note:KIR ROYAL – Use Champagne instead of white wine

Drinks.Name: Last word
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Lemon drop Martini
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Long Island Ice Tea
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: Mai-Tai
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.* The Martinique molasses rum used by Trader Vic was not an Agricole rum but a type of “rummy” from molasses.  Rhum Clement is a close approxiamation

Drinks.Name: Manhattan
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Margarita
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Drinks.Name: Martinez
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Mary Pickford
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Mimosa
Drinks.Method: Pour orange juice into a flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine. Stir gently.Note:Also known as Buck’s Fizz.

Drinks.Name: Mint Julep
Drinks.Method: In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.

Drinks.Name: Mojito
Drinks.Method: Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.

Drinks.Name: Monkey Gland
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Moscow Mule
Drinks.Method: In a Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.

Drinks.Name: Naked and Famous
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Negroni
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients directly into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice, Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: New York Sour
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice.  Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top.

Drinks.Name: Old Cuban
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine.

Drinks.Name: Old Fashioned
Drinks.Method: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Drinks.Name: Paloma
Drinks.Method: Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: Paper Plane
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Paradise
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Penicillin
Drinks.Method: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the single malt Whiskey on top.

Drinks.Name: Pina Colada
Drinks.Method: 45 ml Vodka120 ml Ginger Beer10 ml Fresh Lime Juice

Drinks.Name: Pisco Sour
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.Shake and strain into a chilled goblet glass.

Drinks.Name: Planter’s Punch
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.NOTE:Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

Drinks.Name: Porto Flip
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Ramos Fizz
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice, Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker, and hard shake without ice for one minute. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda.NOTE:The drink was invented by Henry Ramos in 1888, at his bar Meyer’s Table d’Hôtel Internationale in New Orleans. The Ramos Fizz was originally shaken for 12 minutes by a crew of 30 bartenders who passed the shaker from one to another.

Drinks.Name: Russian Spring Punch
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice, and top up with sparkling wine.

Drinks.Name: Rusty Nail
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

Drinks.Name: Sazerac
Drinks.Method: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass.NOTE:The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, Rye Whiskey substituted Cognac as it became hard to obtain.

Drinks.Name: Sea Breeze
Drinks.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

Drinks.Name: Sex on the Beach
Drinks.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

Drinks.Name: Sidecar
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Singapore Sling
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.

Drinks.Name: Southside
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.Note:If egg white is used shake vigorously.

Drinks.Name: Spicy Fifty
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Spritz
Drinks.Method: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.NOTE:There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.

Drinks.Name: Stinger
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Suffering Bastard
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.

Drinks.Name: Tequila Sunrise
Drinks.Method: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.

Drinks.Name: Tipperary
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Tommy’s Margarita
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

Drinks.Name: Tuxedo
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: VE.N.TO
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice.  Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.Notes:*If desired water can be replaced by chamomile infusion in the honey mix.

Drinks.Name: Vesper
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Vieux Carrè
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Whiskey Sour
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cobbler glass. If served “On the rocks”, strain ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.NOTE:If egg white is used shake little harder to release and incorporate the foam from the egg white.

Drinks.Name: White Lady
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Yellow Bird
Drinks.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Drinks.Name: Zombie
Drinks.Method: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds. Serve in a tall tumbler glass.Note:*Donn’s Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup
